About Me

Currently, I am working as a research assistant studying 3-dimensional stable matching.

I have worked as an software engineering intern at Interset where I helped develop their backend API in ElasticSearch. More recently, I worked at Microsoft on the Edge Rendering team doing low-level feature implementation in C++.

I worked as a research intern for Lewis Lab on a research project involving neural networks classifying biological processes.

Outside of work and school I develop interesting projects revolving around machine learning. I also founded the Developer Student Club at uOttawa and ran workshops relating to the cloud computing.

I’m always open to hearing about new opportunities in both industry and research. Don’t hesitate to drop me a line.
